DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective identify molecular feature predict response resistance cetuximab
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study Assessing Molecular Features Predicting Response Cetuximab
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary objective investigate association genomic status EGFR HER-2 gene clinical outcome , include objective response , time progression survival
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm diagnosis colorectal cancer available tumor tissue clinical data ; presence least one measurable lesion . Less 3 week completion previous radiotherapy
